front.title: LSVR IETF Organizationally Specific TLVs for IEEE Std 802.1AB (LLDP)

abstract.t: IEEE Std 802.1AB, commonly known as the Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP), provides a means for individual organizations to define their own Type-Length-Value (TLV) objects for exchange over the protocol. The IETF is a standards development organization with an IANA OUI (RFC 7042) that can be used in LLDP organizationally specific TLVs. This document specifies IETF Organizationally Specific TLVs that support LSVR protocols.
